instruction: Set up to forward every email received by anonym-x2024@outlook.com in the future to anonym-x2024@gmail.com. Please don't touch the online account. Just locally in the Thunderbird!

minimal: `CLICK` on the Folder pane options menu (usually three horizontal lines) at the top of the Folder pane
`TYPING` a name for the filter (e.g., Forward to Gmail)
`CLICK` on the dropdown under 'Apply filter when' and select 'Getting New Mail'
`CLICK` on the first dropdown under the criteria and select 'To'
`CLICK` on the second dropdown under the criteria and select 'is'
`CLICK` on the 'Perform these actions:' dropdown and select 'Forward to'
`CLICK` on 'Apply Now' (optional, if you want to forward existing emails)
